short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculator to evaluate Grade Point Average on a 4.000 scale

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculator to evaluate Grade Point Average on a 4.000 scale. This GPA calculator will allow users to input their grades and level of classes taken, such as 4.0, 4.5, 5.0. After inputting all the information about their grades, the user will calculate the GPA and see what they got according to the 4.000 scale.
